# Challenge "Chef's Kiss ðŸ‘Œ"
<img src="banner.png" width="400px" alt="Banner Image" /><br/>

**Difficulty:** <span style="background-color: #69bbe9; padding: 5px; color: black;">ðŸ¤“ noob</span> | **Category:** <span style="background-color: #ced4da; padding: 5px; color: black;">âš„ misc</span>

One of the bunnies found a remarkable text that withstood all his decoding attempts.

Luckily, it was written on the back of a recipe, which seems to hold the answer to the solution.

    

Download the recipe below.

![Receipe](chefs_recipe.jpg)

# Solution
Reverse the recipe with [CyberChef](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true,false)ROT13(true,true,false,13)From_Base32('A-Z2-7%3D',true)Vigen%C3%A8re_Decode('bunnymaster')From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true,false)ROT8000()XOR(%7B'option':'Hex','string':'1337'%7D,'Standard',false)&&oenc=65001&oeol=NEL)

![CyberChef Solution](chef_solution.png)

## The flag
    he2024{Cyb3rch3f_cooks_the_b3st_d1nners_from_simple_1ngr1d13nts}
